headline: H.C. Wainwright Affirms Biogen Inc. (BIIB) Buy Rating on Lupus Franchise Prospects
summary: Biogen Inc. (NASDAQ:BIIB) is one of the best defensive stocks to buy, according to Steve Cohen. On September 5, H.C. Wainwright reiterated a ‘Buy’ rating on the stock and a $194 price target. The positive stance echoes the research firm’s confidence about the company’s promising lupus franchise. According to H.C. Wainwright, the lupus treatments litifilimab […]
